About.title: About
About.description: üëã Greetings. My name is Choneas (One may also address me by my pseudonym, Li Sushang) . I possess a strong interest in the fields of computer science, including programming, user interface design, and related disciplines. Additionally, I have a keen interest in illustration, animation production, and photography. At present, I am enrolled in academic studies.
About.dream-description: Full stack engineer and English teacher. This position does not require a great deal of cognitive effort; the principle of parsimony is applicable.
About.color-scheme-description: The color scheme of this website is inspired by the character Fuhua from the game Honkai Impact 3rd. The color scheme is based on the character's appearance and personality.
